PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-14601998-08-260,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisApproval (a) to issue the series 54 to 59 of the CANADA SAVINGS BONDS and series 3 to 8 of CANADA PREMIUM BONDS, (b) of the terms and conditions thereof, specifying the maximum rate of interest, and (c) to amend the terms and conditions of previously issued and unmatured CSB and RRSP bonds.
Attachments
precis:
Approval (a) to issue the series 54 to 59 of the CANADA SAVINGS BONDS
and series 3 to 8 of CANADA PREMIUM BONDS, (b) of the terms and
conditions thereof, specifying the maximum rate of interest, and (c) to
amend the terms and conditions of previously issued and unmatured CSB and
RRSP bonds.
